text: 1.9 1 Ti 1.10, 1.15, 2 Ti 1.13, 2.15, 4.3, Tat 2.1 Takaw yɨpɨd gɨl pel agñɨbun ak dɨ mɨdonɨmuŋ. Kɨles gɨl dɨ mɨdɨl nɨm, binɨb okok kɨlop takaw yɨpɨd gup ak nep agñɨ tep gɨl, kɨlop kɨles ñɨnɨmuŋ tek lup. Pen binɨb takaw yɨpɨd gɨl ak tɨbɨlɨkɨpal okok, kɨlop tɨmud wukɨlɨg kɨles gɨl agñɨ tep gonɨmuŋ, takaw pen agɨnɨgel tek olap ma yenɨgab.
